title: Cillian
description: They say you can’t help who you fall in love with.And when I fell head over heels for the sous chef at my father’s restaurant, I believed that was true. I felt it even more so when my father warned me away.We don’t mix business with pleasure.He’s too old for you…But the heart wants what the heart wants.And the world has the ability to break that heart.Because of me, Cillian would lose everything he’s worked for, and I would lose him….Unless I can think of a way to convince my father to give him another chance.Unless I can convince Cillian to give me another chance.Cillian, is book 2 in the Kelly Brothers Series, featuring four steamy stories about love and family that can all be read as standalones or in order.As always, this Megan Wade book comes with her ‘Sugar Promise’. High heat, low drama, guaranteed.
author: Megan Wade
